solution_line_template: The ones with nuts that they ate was {eaten_nuts_portion_percent}% of the box because {eaten_nuts_percent_question}% x {portion_nuts_decimal} = {eaten_nuts_portion_percent}%
The ones without nuts that they ate equaled {eaten_no_nuts_portion_percent}% of the box because {eaten_no_nuts_percent_question}% x {portion_no_nuts_decimal} = {eaten_no_nuts_portion_percent}%

They ate {total_eaten_percent}% of the box because {eaten_nuts_portion_percent} + {eaten_no_nuts_portion_percent} = <<{eaten_nuts_portion_percent}+{eaten_no_nuts_portion_percent}={total_eaten_percent}>>{total_eaten_percent}
They left {total_left_percent}% of the box because {total_percent_whole} - {total_eaten_percent} = <<{total_percent_whole}-{total_eaten_percent}={total_left_percent}>>{total_left_percent}
